EmailTemplate.description: automated email reminder to the requestor 10 days before the "Due Date" value in the field above if the "Insurance Needed" field equals Yes and the "Submitted Date" field is empty
EmailTemplate.name: 10 days before Insurance is needed alert
EmailTemplate.subject: Insurance for your event is due within 10 business days
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
As a reminder, insurance is still due for your event on {!Case.Event_Start__c}. Please make sure to upload insurance that meets City & County of San Francisco requirements - directions here for posting by {!Case.Insurance_Needed_by_Date__c}. Please note that the street closure permit is invalid if sufficient insurance is not received.
If you have not already done so, please also upload a letter or copy of the invoice for the garbage/recycling vendors and event clean-up at this time. As a reminder, the recycling vendor must have a certificate from the Department of the Environment confirming completion of their training program. Event producers are also required to attend a zero waste event training.
To view your online request, follow the link provided below:
{!Case.Link}
Thank you,
San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency
